text: Sand Spring is an unincorporated community in Garrett County, Maryland, United States. ==History== A variant name was "Fearer". A post office called Fearer was established in 1893, and remained in operation until 1939. The origin of the name "Fearer" is obscure. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Garrett County, Maryland Category:Unincorporated communities in Maryland
title: Sand Spring, Maryland
